name: Elegy - The Girl On The Moon
name_original: Elegy - The Girl On The Moon
description:
Everybody in this dark city is chasing for money. However, that’s not true for this little girl. She only wants to please her uncaring parents, who have ignored her for years. Since she feels lonely, she always looks up, staring at the moon in the night sky. She suddenly starts to dream about something impossible: she wants to sit on the moon.

Elegy - The Girl On The Moon is a role-playing puzzle game with a fantastic storyline, art, and music. The game has two possible endings. Be careful enough to avoid the tragedy from happening. Please treat her with patience. Good luck.
